Wisdom: ثَلَاثٌ يُوجِبْنَ الْمَحَبَّةَ حُسْنُ الْخُلُقِ وَحُسْنُ الرِّفْقِ وَالتَّوَاضُعُ
enWisdom: Three things bring about love: religion, humility and generosity

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الْخُلُقِ يُورِثُ الْمَحَبَّةَ وَيُؤَكِّدُ الْمَوَدَّةَ
enWisdom: Good character brings about adoration and strengthens love

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِحُسْنِ الْخُلُقِ فَإِنَّهُ يُكْسِبُكَ الْمَحَبَّةَ
enWisdom: You must adopt a good character for this will earn you adoration [of others]

Wisdom: مَنْ حَسُنَ خُلُقُهُ كَثُرَ مُحِبُّوهُ وَأَنِسَتِ النُّفُوسُ بِهِ
enWisdom: One whose character is good, more people adore him and feel at ease with him

Wisdom: مَا اسْتُجْلِبَتِ الْمَحَبَّةُ بِمِثْلِ السَّخَاءِ وَالرِّفْقِ وَحُسْنِ الْخُلُقِ
enWisdom: Nothing brings about love like generosity, companionship and good character
With good character, life becomes pleasant
One whose qualities are good, his companionship is pleasant

Wisdom: لَا عَيْشَ أَهْنَأُ مِنْ حُسْنِ الْخُلُقِ
enWisdom: There is no life more satisfying than [one lived with] good character

Wisdom: وُصُولُ الْمَرْءِ إِلَى كُلِّ مَا يَبْتَغِيهِ مِنْ طِيبِ عَيْشِهِ وَأَمْنِ سَرْبِهِ وَسَعَةِ رِزْقِهِ بِحُسْنِ نِيَّتِهِ وَسَعَةِ خُلُقِهِ
enWisdom: A person’s attainment of all that he wishes for, such as a good life, the security of his flock and an increase in wealth, is through the goodness of his intention and excellence of his character
By [adopting] good character, sustenance becomes abundant

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الْأَخْلَاقِ يُدِرُّ الْأَرْزَاقَ وَيُونِسُ الرِّفَاقَ
enWisdom: Good character increases sustenance and makes companions feel at ease
In good character, there are treasures of [blessings and] sustenance
One whose character is noble, his sustenance is increased
When the character is good, the speech becomes gentle

Wisdom: حُسْنُ السِّيرَةِ جَمَالُ الْقُدْرَةِ وَحِصْنُ الْإِمْرَةِ
enWisdom: Good conduct is the beauty of power and the fortress of authority
Good conduct is the sign of a good conscience

Wisdom: كَمْ مِنْ وَضِيعٍ رَفَعَهُ حُسْنُ خُلُقِهِ
enWisdom: How many a lowly person has been elevated by his good character!

Wisdom: مَنْ حَسُنَ خُلُقُهُ سَهُلَتْ لَهُ طُرُقُهُ
enWisdom: One whose character is good, his ways become easy
